anya-e0803n7:6_8: “mahanto, bhavanto, caranto”tiādīnaṁ bahuvacanattameva kathitaṁ, na ekavacanattaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:6_9: Tathā hi tattha “mahaṁ bhavaṁ caraṁ tiṭṭha”nti gāthaṁ vatvā “mahaṁ tiṭṭhati, mahanto
anya-e0803n7:6_10: tiṭṭhantī”ti ca, “bho mahā, bhavanto mahanto”ti ca, “bhavaṁ tiṭṭhati, bhavanto tiṭṭhantī”ti ca ādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:7_0: Ettha pana “bhavaṁ, bhavanto”ti padāni yattha “honto hontā”ti kriyatthaṁ na vadanti,
anya-e0803n7:7_1: tattha “bhavaṁ kaccāno. Mā bhavanto evaṁ avacutthā”tiādīsu viya aññasmiṁ atthe patanato

anya-e0803n7:15: Ekassapi bahukatte, pavatti na tu dissati.
anya-e0803n7:17: Gahaṇe sati bahavo, dosā dissanti saccato.

anya-e0803n7:22_1: kata”nti loke pasiddhaṁ, tasmā idaṁ ṭhānaṁ punappunaṁ upaparikkhitabbaṁ. Kiñcāpettha
anya-e0803n7:22_2: there gāravena evaṁ vuttaṁ, tathāpi pāḷinayaṁ garuṁ katvā diṭṭhenekavacananayena

anya-e0803n7:29: Tatra tāva bhavantasaddassa nāmikapadamālā vuccati – bhavaṁsaddo hi “vaḍḍhanto, honto”ti atthepi vadati. Tesaṁ vasena ayaṁ nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n7:30_0: Bhavaṁ, bhavanto, bhavantā. Bhavantaṁ, bhavante. Bhavantena, bhavantehi, bhavantebhi.
anya-e0803n7:30_1: Bhavantassa, bhavantānaṁ. Bhavantā, bhavantasmā, bhavantamhā, bhavantehi, bhavantebhi.
anya-e0803n7:30_2: Bhavantassa, bhavantānaṁ. Bhavante, bhavantasmiṁ, bhavantamhi, bhavantesu. He bhavanta, he bhavantā.
anya-e0803n7:31_1: hi “suvijāno bhavaṁ hoti. Dhammakāmo bhavaṁ hoti. Rājā bhavanto nānāsampattīhi modati.
anya-e0803n7:31_2: Kuḷīradaho gaṅgāya ekābaddho, gaṅgāya pūraṇakāle gaṅgodakena pūrati, udake mandī
anya-e0803n7:31_3: bhavante dahato udakaṁ gaṅgāya otaratī”ti payogā bhavanti, tasmā ayaṁ nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n7:31_4: sārato paccetabbā. Ettha bhavaṁsaddamattaṁ vajjetvā gacchamānacaramānasaddādīsu viya
anya-e0803n7:31_5: bhavantasadde “bhavanto, bhavantā”ti purisanayopi labbhati, napuṁsakaliṅge vattabbe
anya-e0803n7:32_0: Ayañca viseso “bhavanto”ti padaṁ vaḍḍhanabhavanatthato aññatthe vattamānaṁ bahuvacanameva
anya-e0803n7:32_1: hoti, yathā “bhavanto āgacchantī”ti. Vaḍḍhanabhavanatthesu vattamānaṁ ekavacanameva.
anya-e0803n7:32_2: Atrime payogā “anupubbena bhavanto viññutaṁ pāpuṇāti. Samaṇena nāma īdisesu kammesu
anya-e0803n7:32_3: abyāvaṭena bhavitabbaṁ, evaṁ bhavanto hi samaṇo susamaṇo assā”ti. “Bhavaṁ” iti padaṁ
anya-e0803n7:32_4: pana ubhayatthāpi ekavacanameva, tasmā idāni “bhavaṁ ānando. Bhavanto āgacchanti,
anya-e0803n7:32_5: appasaddā bhavanto hontu, mā bhonto saddamakatthā”ti evamādipayogadassanavasena vohāravisese
anya-e0803n7:32_6: pavattaṁ aññaṁ atthaṁ paṭicca aparāpi nāmikapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n7:33_0: Bhavaṁ, bhavanto, bhonto. Bhavantaṁ, bhavante. Bhavatā, bhotā, bhavantena, bhavantehi,
anya-e0803n7:33_1: bhavantebhi. Bhavato, bhoto, bhavantassa, bhavantānaṁ, bhavataṁ. Bhavatā, bhotā,
anya-e0803n7:33_2: bhavantehi, bhavantebhi. Bhavato, bhoto, bhavantassa, bhavantānaṁ, bhavataṁ. Bhavati,
anya-e0803n7:33_3: bhavante, bhavantasmiṁ, bhavantamhi, bhavantesu. Bho, bhavanto, bhonto iti.
anya-e0803n7:34_0: Ettha pana “bho”iccādīni tīṇi padāni yasmā vohāravisesapavattāni ālapanapadāni honti,
anya-e0803n7:34_1: tasmā “āvuso, bhante”ti padāni viya bhosaddādiupapadavantāni na bhavanti, “bho purisa,
anya-e0803n7:34_2: bhavanto brāhmaṇā, bhonto samaṇā, bho rāja”iccādīsu hi purisasaddādayoyeva bhosaddādi
anya-e0803n7:34_3: upapadavanto bhavanti. Idha ca “bhavaṁ ānando”ti ettha bhavaṁsaddena samānatthāni
anya-e0803n7:34_4: “bho, bhavanto, bhonto”ti padāni vuttāni, na pana “dhammakāmo bhavaṁ hotī”ti ettha
anya-e0803n7:34_5: bhavaṁsaddena samānatthāni. Paṭhamasmiñhi naye vaḍḍhanatthavasena “bho bhavanta,
anya-e0803n7:34_6: bhavanto bhavantā, bhonto bhavantā”ti bhosaddādayo ālapanapadānaṁ upapadāni bhavanti,
anya-e0803n7:34_7: na dutiyasmiṁ naye. Āmeḍitavasena pana “bho bho, bhavanto bhavanto, bhonto bhonto”ti
anya-e0803n7:35_0: Atridaṁ bhūdhātuvasena saṅkhepato pāḷinidassanaṁ – kasmā bhavaṁ vijjanamaraññanissito.
anya-e0803n7:35_1: Kathaṁ panāhaṁ bho taṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ jānissāmi. Evaṁ bhoti kho ambaṭṭho māṇavo
anya-e0803n7:35_2: brāhmaṇassa pokkharasātissa paṭissutvā. Mā bhavanto evaṁ avacuttha. Imaṁ bhonto nisāmetha.
anya-e0803n7:35_3: Evaṁ bho purisa jānāhi, pāpadhammā asaññatā iccevamādi. Ettha “bhavaṁ”iccādīni bhūdhātumayāni
anya-e0803n7:36_0: Apica tesu “bho, bhavanto, bhonto”ti imāni nipātapadānipi hontīti vavatthapetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:36_1: “Bho purisā”tiādīsu tesaṁ nipātānipātabhāve vivādo na karaṇīyo. Kaccāyanasmiñhi “bho
anya-e0803n7:36_2: ge tū”ti vuttaṁ. Aññattha pana “āmantanatthe nipāto”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tathā hi niruttimañjūsāyaṁ
anya-e0803n7:36_3: vuttaṁ “bhotidaṁ āmantanatthe nipāto. So na kevalaṁ ekavacanameva hoti, atha kho
anya-e0803n7:36_4: bahuvacanampi hotīti ‘bho purisā’ti bahuvacanappayogopi gahito. ‘Bhavanto’ti padaṁ
anya-e0803n7:36_5: pana bahuvacanameva hotīti ‘purisā’ti puna vutta”nti. Pāḷiyañhi aṭṭhakathāsu ca nipātabhūto
anya-e0803n7:36_6: bhosaddo ekavacanabahuvacanavasena dvidhā dissati, itare pana bahuvacanavaseneva
anya-e0803n7:36_7: dissanti. Tesaṁ tu nipātapadatte rūpanipphādanakiccaṁ natthi. Tesu bhosaddassa nipātapadattā
anya-e0803n7:36_8: āhaccabhāsite nijjīvālapane itthiliṅgavisayo “ummujja bho puthusile, pariplava bho
anya-e0803n7:36_9: puthusile”ti payogopi dissati. Atrimā bhosaddassa pavattiparidīpanī gāthāyo –

anya-e0803n7:75_1: ca. Etañhi rūpaṁ samantapāsādikāyaṁ manussaviggahaṭṭhāne dissati. Uttarimanussadhammapāḷiyaṁ
anya-e0803n7:75_2: pana “mayañcamhā anarahanto”ti padaṁ dissati. Arahantaṁ, arahante. Arahatā, sesaṁ
anya-e0803n7:76_0: Tathā hi “arahaṁ sammāsambuddho. Arahaṁ sugato loke. Arahanto sammāsambuddhā”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n7:76_1: arahaṁsaddādayo guṇavācakā. “Arahā ahosi. Ahañhi arahā loke. Eko arahā, ekasaṭṭhi
anya-e0803n7:77: Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale;
anya-e0803n7:79_0: Mayañcamhā anarahanto”tiādīsu arahāsaddādayo paṇṇattivācakāti daṭṭhabbā. Idha itthinapuṁsakaliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n7:79_1: visuṁ vattabbanayo appasiddho. Yadi evaṁ āsavakkhayaṁ pattā itthī kathaṁ vattabbā,
anya-e0803n7:79_2: āsavakkhayaṁ pattaṁ cittaṁ kathaṁ vattabbanti? Itthī tāva “yaṁ itthī arahaṁ assa

anya-e0803n7:79_4: arahā ahosī”ti vattabbā. Cittaṁ pana guṇavaseneva “arahaṁ citta”nti vattabbanti.

anya-e0803n7:82_0: Ettha pana “addhā hi tāta satanesa dhammo”ti jayaddisajātakapāḷidassanato “satāna”nti
anya-e0803n7:82_1: vuttaṁ. Tattha hi satanesāti satānaṁ esāti chedo, rassattaniggahītasaralopavasena
anya-e0803n7:82_2: ca rūpaniṭṭhānaṁ veditabbaṁ. Tathā hi tadaṭṭhakathāyaṁ “addhā ekaṁsena esa tāta satānaṁ
anya-e0803n7:82_3: paṇḍitānaṁ dhammo sabhāvo”ti attho vutto. Ayaṁ ye loke “sappurisā”ti ca “ariyā”ti
anya-e0803n7:82_4: ca “paṇḍitā”ti ca vuccanti, tesaṁ vācakassa santasaddassa nāmikapadamālā. Tappaṭisedhassa
anya-e0803n7:82_5: pana asaṁ, asanto, katthaci asantā iccapi. Tathā hi “asantā kira maṁ jammā, tāta
anya-e0803n7:82_6: tātāti bhāsare”ti pāḷi dissati. “Asaṁ, asantaṁ, asante. Asatā”tiādinā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n7:82_7: Imasmiṁ atthe “santo, asanto”timāni bahuvacanakāniyeva bhavanti, na katthacipi ekavacanakāni.
anya-e0803n7:82_8: Kasmā? Paṇṇattivācakattā. Aññatra pana “santo, danto”tiādīsu ekavacanāniyeva ṭhapetvā
anya-e0803n7:83: Idāni paṇṇattivācakānaṁ tesaṁ kānici payogāni kathayāma –
anya-e0803n7:84_0: Sameti asatā asaṁ. Yaṁ yañhi rāja bhajati, santaṁ vā yadi vā asaṁ. Na sā sabhā yattha
anya-e0803n7:84_1: na santi santo. Asanto nirayaṁ yanti, santo saggaparāyaṇā. Asante nopaseveyya, sante
anya-e0803n7:84_2: seveyya paṇḍito. Sabbhireva samāsetha. Sataṁ dhammo iccevamādīni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n7:85_0: Yo panamhehi padamālāyaṁ “sabbhī”ti ayaṁ saddo tatiyāpañcamībahuvacanavasena yojito,
anya-e0803n7:85_1: so ca kho santaiti akārantapakativasena, aññattha pana “sabbhī”ti ikārantapakativasena
anya-e0803n7:85_2: yojetabbo. Tathā hi sabbhīti sappuriso nibbānañca, sundarādhivacanaṁ vā etaṁ sabbhīti.
anya-e0803n7:85_3: Sabbo cāyamattho sāṭṭhakathāya “bahumpetaṁ asabbhi jātavedā”ti imāya pāḷiyā “santo
anya-e0803n7:85_4: have sabbhi pavedayantī”ti imāya ca dīpetabbo.
anya-e0803n7:88_0: Atrāyaṁ yojanā – bho sabbhi tiṭṭha, sabbhi tiṭṭhati, sabbhi saha gacchati, sabbhi
anya-e0803n7:88_1: apehi, asabbhirūpo puriso. Yasmā panāyaṁ sāsanānukūlā, tasmā imissā tadanukūlattaṁ
anya-e0803n7:88_2: dassetuṁ idha sāsanato payoge dassessāma atakkāvacare vicitte sugatapāḷinaye sotūnaṁ
anya-e0803n7:88_3: visāradamatipaṭilābhatthaṁ. Taṁ yathā? Bahumpetaṁ asabbhi jātaveda, yaṁ taṁ vāladhinā’bhipūjayāma.
anya-e0803n7:88_4: Sabbhi kubbetha santhavaṁ. Yaṁ sālavanasmiṁ senako, pāpakammamakari asabbhirūpaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:88_5: Ābādhoyaṁ asabbhirūpo. Asammodako thaddho asabbhirūpo”ti. Tattha ālapanavacane diṭṭheyeva
anya-e0803n7:88_6: paccattavacanaṁ pāḷiyaṁ sarūpato anāgatampi diṭṭhameva hoti. Tathā karaṇavacane diṭṭheyeva
anya-e0803n7:88_7: nissakkavacanampi diṭṭhameva hoti. Samāse saddarūpe diṭṭheyeva byāse saddarūpaṁ yathāsambhavaṁ
anya-e0803n7:88_8: diṭṭhameva hoti ṭhapetvā “hetusatthāradassana”ntiādīni. Tattha ca nibbānavācako ce,
anya-e0803n7:88_9: sabbhisaddo itthiliṅgo santivisuddhi nibbutisaddā viya, so ca yamakamahātheramate
anya-e0803n7:88_10: rattinayena yojetabbo. Sabbesamikārantitthiliṅgānaṁ sādhāraṇo hi so nayo. Sundaratthavācako
anya-e0803n7:88_11: ce, aggi ratti aṭṭhinayehi yojetabbo vāccaliṅgattā. “Sabbhidhammabhūtaṁ nibbāna”nti
anya-e0803n7:88_12: ettha hi sundaradhammabhūtaṁ nibbānanti attho. Evaṁ pāḷinayavasena ālapanādīsu pañcasu
anya-e0803n7:88_13: ṭhānesu sabbhisaddassa pavattiṁ ñatvā puna aṭṭhakathānayavasenapi tappavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n7:88_14: Kathaṁ? Yasmā sagāthāvaggassa aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “santo ‘sabbhīhi saddhiṁ sataṁ dhammo
anya-e0803n7:88_15: na jaraṁ upetī’ti pavedayantī”ti imasmiṁ padese “sabbhīhī”ti hivacanavasena saddaracanāviseso
anya-e0803n7:88_16: aṭṭhakathācariyehi dassito, tasmā sabbhisaddo sabbesupi vibhattivacanesu yojetabbo. Atridaṁ vadāma –

anya-e0803n7:92: Yasmā tasmā sabbhisaddaṁ, viññū sabbadhi yojaye.
anya-e0803n7:93_0: “Ovadeyyānusāseyya, asabbhā ca nivāraye”ti ettha pana “asabbhā”tipadaṁ vicitravuttīsu
anya-e0803n7:93_1: taddhitapaccayesu ṇyapaccayavasena nipphattimupāgatanti veditabbaṁ. Kathaṁ? Yebhuyyena
anya-e0803n7:93_2: asabbhīsu bhavaṁ asabbhaṁ. Kiṁ taṁ? Akusalaṁ, tato asabbhā akusaladhammā nivāraye

anya-e0803n7:160_3: vadanti. Sabbametaṁ na yujjati aggini ginisaddānamupalabbhanato, sabbāsupi vibhattīsu
anya-e0803n7:160_4: dvīsu vacanesu yojetabbatādassanato ca. Tathā hi suttanipāte kokālikasutte –
anya-e0803n7:165_0: Imasmiṁ padese “aggini”nti upayogavacanaṁ dissati. Tenāha aṭṭhakathācariyo “agginiṁ
anya-e0803n7:165_1: sampajjalitanti samantatojālaṁ sabbadisāsu ca sampajjalitamaggi”nti. Tatreva ca suttanipāte kokālikasutte –
anya-e0803n7:170_0: Imasmiṁ padese samāsavisayattā agginisañjalitanti agginīhi sañjalitanti attho labbhati,
anya-e0803n7:170_1: tathā agginisamāsūti agginīhi sadisāsūti atthopi. Evaṁ samāsavidhānamukhena “agginīhī”ti
anya-e0803n7:171_0: Ginisaddopi ca pāḷiyaṁ dissati. Tathā hi “tameva kaṭṭhaṁ dahati, yasmā so jāyate
anya-e0803n7:171_1: ginī”ti cūḷabodhicariyāyaṁ ginisaddo diṭṭho. Keci panettha sandhivasena akāralopaṁ
anya-e0803n7:171_2: saññogādissa ca gakārassa lopaṁ vadanti, tampi na yujjati tassā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāyaṁ
anya-e0803n7:171_3: “yasmāti yato kaṭṭhā. Ginīti aggī”ti evaṁ ginisaddassa ulliṅgetvā vacanato. Tathā
anya-e0803n7:171_4: “channā kuṭi āhito ginī”ti imassa dhaniyasuttassa aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “āhitoti ābhato jālito
anya-e0803n7:171_5: vā. Ginīti aggī”ti vacanato, tatheva ca “mahāgini pajjalito, anāhāropasammatī”ti
anya-e0803n7:171_6: imissā theragāthāya saṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ “ginīti aggī”ti vacanato. Yadi hi ginisaddo visuṁ
anya-e0803n7:171_7: na siyā, aṭṭhakathācariyā “jāyate ginī”tiādīni “jāyate agginī”tiādinā padacchedavasena
anya-e0803n7:171_8: atthaṁ vadeyyuṁ. Yasmā evaṁ na vadiṁsu, “ginīti aggī”ti pana vadiṁsu, tena ñāyati
anya-e0803n7:171_9: “ginisaddopi visuṁ atthī”ti. Ye “ginisaddo natthī”ti vadanti, tesaṁ vacanaṁ na gahetabbameva
anya-e0803n7:171_10: sāsane ginisaddassupalabbhanato. Suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyañhi “channā kuṭi āhito ginī”ti
anya-e0803n7:171_11: pāṭhassa saṁvaṇṇanāyameva “tesu ṭhānesu aggini ‘ginī’ti vohariyatī”ti tassa abhidhānantaraṁ
anya-e0803n7:175: Tamhi ṭhāne manussānaṁ, bhāsā eva giniccayaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:178_0: Iti alābu lābusaddā viya aggini ginisaddāpi bhagavato pācane dissantīti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n7:178_1: Yathā pana agginisaddassa sabbāsu vibhattīsu dvīsu vacanesu yojetabbatā siddhā, tathā
anya-e0803n7:179_0: Aggini, agginī, agginayo. Agginiṁ, agginī, agginayo. Aggininā, agginīhi, agginībhi.
anya-e0803n7:179_1: Agginissa, agginīnaṁ. Aggininā, agginismā, agginimhā, agginīhi, agginībhi. Agginissa,
anya-e0803n7:179_2: agginīnaṁ. Agginismiṁ, agginimhi, agginīsu. Bho aggini, bhavanto agginī, bhavanto agginayo.
anya-e0803n7:180_0: “Gini, ginī, ginayo. Giniṁ, ginī, ginayo, gininā”ti sabbaṁ yojetabbaṁ. Iti pāḷinayānusārena
anya-e0803n7:180_1: aggini ginisaddānaṁ nāmikapadamālā yojitā. Atha vā yathā sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ satva paddhasvāminīti
anya-e0803n7:180_2: saññogavasena vuttānaṁ saddānaṁ māgadhabhāsaṁ patvā sattavapadumasuvāminīti nissaññogavasena
anya-e0803n7:180_3: uccāritā pāḷi dissati “tvañca uttamasattavo”tiādinā, tathā sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ agnīti
anya-e0803n7:180_4: saññogavasena vuttassa māgadhabhāsaṁ patvā “agginī”ti saññoganakāravasena uccāritā
anya-e0803n7:180_5: pāḷi dissati “agginiṁ sampajjalitaṁ pavisantī”tiādikā. Yathā ca veyyākaraṇehi sakkaṭabhāsābhūto
anya-e0803n7:180_6: agnisaddo sabbāsu vibhattīsu tīsu vacanesu yojiyati, tathā māgadhabhāsābhūto agginisaddopi
anya-e0803n7:180_7: sabbāsu vibhattīsu dvīsu vacanesu yojetabbova hoti, tasmā so idhamhehi yojiyati,
anya-e0803n7:180_8: ginisaddopi agginisaddena samānatthattā, īsakañca sarūpattā tatheva yojiyatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:181_0: Ettha siyā – yadi agginisaddo sabbesu vibhattivacanesu yojetabbo, atha kasmā kaccāyane
anya-e0803n7:181_1: “aggissinī”ti lakkhaṇena simhi pare aggisaddantassa iniādeso dassitoti? Saccaṁ, yathā
anya-e0803n7:181_2: navakkhattuṁ ṭhapetvā katekasesassa dasasaddassa yovacanamhi navādesaṁ katvā yovacanassa
anya-e0803n7:181_3: utiādesaṁ kasmā “navutī”ti rūpe nipphanne puna “navutī”ti pakatiṁ ṭhapetvā tato naṁvacanaṁ
anya-e0803n7:181_4: katvā “navutīna”nti rūpaṁ nipphāditaṁ. Itthiliṅge pana nādiekavacanāni katvā tesaṁ
anya-e0803n7:181_5: yāādesaṁ katvā “navutiyā”ti rūpaṁ nipphāditaṁ. Tathā hi “channavutīnaṁ pāsaṇḍānaṁ
anya-e0803n7:181_6: dhammānaṁ pavaraṁ yadidaṁ sugatavinayaṁ navutiyā haṁsasahassehi parivuto”tiādīni
anya-e0803n7:181_7: payogāni dissanti. Tathā simhi aggisaddantassa iniādesakaraṇavasena “agginī”ti rūpe
anya-e0803n7:181_8: nipphannepi puna “agginī”ti pakatiṁ ṭhapetvā tato yoaṁnādayo vibhattiyo katvā “aggini,
anya-e0803n7:181_9: agginī, agginayo. Agginiṁ, agginī, agginayo. Aggininā”tiādīni kathaṁ na nipphajjissantīti
anya-e0803n7:184: Idāni bhāvī iccetassa pakatirūpassa aññesañca taṁsadisānaṁ nāmikapadamālāvibhāgaṁ vakkhāma pubbācariyamataṁ purecaraṁ katvā.
anya-e0803n7:185_0: Daṇḍī, daṇḍī, daṇḍino. Daṇḍiṁ, daṇḍī, daṇḍino. Daṇḍinā, daṇḍīhi, daṇḍībhi. Daṇḍissa,
anya-e0803n7:185_1: daṇḍino, daṇḍīnaṁ. Daṇḍinā, daṇḍīhi, daṇḍībhi. Daṇḍissa, daṇḍino, daṇḍīnaṁ. Daṇḍismiṁ,
anya-e0803n7:185_2: daṇḍimhi, daṇḍīsu. Bho daṇḍi, bho daṇḍī, bhavanto daṇḍino. Yamakamahātheramataṁ.
anya-e0803n7:186_1: “daṇḍinī”ti bhummekavacanañca nāgataṁ, tathāpi tattha tattha taṁsadisassa payogassa
anya-e0803n7:188: Santi hi daharā pakkhī, paññavanto jutindharā”ti
anya-e0803n7:189: Pāḷiyaṁ “pakkhī”iti paccattabahuvacanassa dassanato pana “daṇḍī”iti paccattopayogabahuvacanāni vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:190_0: Bhāvī, bhāvī, bhāvino. Bhāviṁ, bhāvinaṁ, bhāvī, bhāvino. Bhāvinā, bhāvīhi, bhāvībhi.
anya-e0803n7:190_1: Bhāvissa, bhāvino, bhāvīnaṁ. Bhāvinā, bhāvismā, bhāvimhā, bhāvīhi, bhāvībhi. Bhāvissa,
anya-e0803n7:190_2: bhāvino, bhāvīnaṁ. (Bhāvini) bhāvismiṁ, bhāvimhi, bhāvīsu. Bho bhāvi, bho bhāvī, bhavanto bhāvino.
anya-e0803n7:191: Evaṁ vibhāvī sambhāvī, paribhāvī dhajī gaṇī;
anya-e0803n7:192: Sukhī rogī sasī kuṭṭhī, makuṭī kusalī balī.
anya-e0803n7:193: Jaṭī yogī karī yānī, tomarī musalī phalī;
anya-e0803n7:194: Dantī mantī sudhī medhī, bhāgī bhogī nakhī sikhī.
anya-e0803n7:195: Dhammī saṅghī ñāṇī atthī, hatthī cakkhī pakkhī dāṭhī;
anya-e0803n7:196: Raṭṭhī chattī mālī cammī, cārī cāgī kāmī sāmī.
anya-e0803n7:199: Vajjadassī ca pāṇī ca, yasassiccādayopi ca;
anya-e0803n7:200: Etesaṁ koci bhedo tu, ekadesena vuccate.
anya-e0803n7:201: Īkārantapulliṅgapadesu hi “vajjadassī, pāṇī”iccevamādīnaṁ upayogabhummavacanaṭṭhāne “vajjadassinaṁ, pāṇine”tiādīnipi rūpāni bhavanti. Ettha ca –
anya-e0803n7:203: Evaṁ jarā ca maccu ca, adhivattanti pāṇine.
anya-e0803n7:206: Ucchinno saha raṭṭhena, majjhāraññaṁ tadā ahu.
anya-e0803n7:208_0: Evamādayo payogā veditabbā, ayaṁ nayo daṇḍīpadādīsupi labbhateva samānagatikattā
anya-e0803n7:208_1: daṇḍīpadādīnaṁ vajjadassīpadādīhi. Tasmā upayogaṭṭhāne “daṇḍiṁ, daṇḍinaṁ, daṇḍino,
anya-e0803n7:208_2: daṇḍine”ti yojetabbaṁ. Bhummaṭṭhāne “daṇḍismiṁ, daṇḍimhi, daṇḍini, daṇḍine, daṇḍīsu,
anya-e0803n7:208_3: daṇḍinesū”ti yojetabbaṁ. Esa nayo gāmaṇī senānīiccādīni vajjetvā yathārahaṁ īkārantapulliṅgesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n7:211_0: Idāni bhūdhātumayānaṁ ukārantapulliṅgānaṁ appasiddhattā aññesaṁ ukārantapulliṅgānaṁ
anya-e0803n7:211_1: vasena pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālaṁ pūressāma. Katamāni tāni? “Bhikkhu hetu setu
anya-e0803n7:211_2: ketu rāhu bhāṇu khāṇu saṅku ucchu veḷu maccu jantu sindhu bandhu ruru neru sattu
anya-e0803n7:212_0: Bhikkhu, bhikkhū, bhikkhavo. Bhikkhuṁ, bhikkhū, bhikkhavo. Bhikkhunā, bhikkhūhi,
anya-e0803n7:212_1: bhikkhūbhi. Bhikkhussa, bhikkhuno, bhikkhūnaṁ. Bhikkhunā, bhikkhusmā, bhikkhumhā,
anya-e0803n7:212_2: bhikkhūhi, bhikkhūbhi. Bhikkhussa, bhikkhuno, bhikkhūnaṁ. Bhikkhusmiṁ, bhikkhumhi,
anya-e0803n7:212_3: bhikkhūsu. Bho bhikkhu, bhavanto bhikkhū, bhikkhave, bhikkhavo. Bhikkhuādīni aññāni
anya-e0803n7:213: Ayampi panettha viseso ñeyyo – hetu, hetū, hetuyo, hetavo. Hetuṁ, hetū, hetuyo, hetavo. Bho hetu, bhavanto hetū, hetave, hetavo. Sesaṁ bhikkhusamaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:214_1: pulliṅgarūpampi sattamīṭhāne icchitabbaṁ. Kānici hi pulliṅgarūpāni kehici itthiliṅgarūpehi
anya-e0803n7:214_2: sadisāni bhavanti. Taṁ yathā? “Uṭṭhehi katte taramāno. Ehi bālekhamāpehi, kusarājaṁ
anya-e0803n7:214_3: mahabbalaṁ. Bhātarā mātarā adhipatiyā rattiyā hetuyo dhenuyo matyā petyā”ti evaṁ
anya-e0803n7:214_4: nayadassanena “hetuyā tīṇi. Adhipatiyā satta. Uṭṭhehi katte”tiādīsu liṅgavipallāsacintā na uppādetabbā.
anya-e0803n7:215: Jantu, jantū, jantuyo, jantuno, jantavo. Jantuṁ, jantū, jantuyo, jantuno, jantavo. Bho jantu, bhavanto jantū, jantave jantavo. Sesaṁ bhikkhusamaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:216_0: Garu, garū, garavo, garuno. Garuṁ, garū, garavo, garuno. Bho garu, bhavanto garū,
anya-e0803n7:216_1: garavo, garuno. Sesaṁ bhikkhusamaṁ. Ettha pana “bhattu ca garuno sabbe, paṭipūjeti
anya-e0803n7:216_3: na gāthāsu. “Bhikkhavo”ti paccattapadaṁ gāthāsuyeva dissati, na cuṇṇiyapadesu, apica
anya-e0803n7:216_5: dissati, na asandhivisaye, buddhassa pana bhikkhūnaṁ āmantanapāḷiyaṁ sandhivisayepi
anya-e0803n7:216_6: asandhivisayepi dissati. “Bhikkhavo”ti āmantanapadaṁ buddhassa bhikkhūnaṁ āmantanapāḷiyaṁ
anya-e0803n7:216_7: gāthāsu ca dissati, cuṇṇiyapadesu ca sandhivisayeyeva dissati. Sāvakassa pana bhikkhūnaṁ
anya-e0803n7:216_8: āmantanapāḷiyaṁ na dissatīti ayaṁ dvinnaṁ viseso daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi “evañca pana
anya-e0803n7:216_9: bhikkhave imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyāthā”tiādīsu “bhikkhave”ti padaṁ cuṇṇiyapadesveva
anya-e0803n7:216_10: diṭṭhaṁ. “Bhikkhavo tisatā ime, yācanti pañjalīkatā”tiādīsu “bhikkhavo”ti paccattapadaṁ
anya-e0803n7:216_11: gāthāsuyeva diṭṭhaṁ. “Āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi āvuso bhikkhave”ti evamādīsu
anya-e0803n7:216_12: sāvakassa bhikkhūnaṁ āmantanapāḷīsu sandhivisayeyeva “bhikkhave”ti padaṁ diṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:216_13: “Bhikkhū āmantesi sotukāmattha bhikkhave”ti “idha bhikkhave bhikkhū”tiādīsu pana
anya-e0803n7:216_14: buddhassa bhikkhūnaṁ āmantanapāḷīsu sandhivisayāvisayesu “bhikkhave”ti padaṁ diṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:216_15: “Araññe rukkhamūle vā, suññāgāreva bhikkhavo”ti “tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi
anya-e0803n7:216_16: bhikkhavo”ti evamādīsu buddhassa bhikkhūnaṁ āmantanapāḷīsu “bhikkhavo”ti āmantanapadaṁ
anya-e0803n7:216_17: gāthāsu ca diṭṭhaṁ, cuṇṇiyapadesu ca sandhivisayeyeva diṭṭhaṁ. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0803n7:223: Idāni pana sayambhūiccetassa pakatirūpassa taṁsadisānañca nāmikapadamālaṁ kathayāma –
anya-e0803n7:224_0: Sayambhū, sayambhū, sayambhuvo. Sayambhuṁ, sayambhū, sayambhuvo. Sayambhunā, sayambhūhi,
anya-e0803n7:224_1: sayambhūbhi. Sayambhussa, sayambhuno, sayambhūnaṁ. Sayambhunā, sayambhusmā, sayambhumhā,
anya-e0803n7:224_2: sayambhūhi, sayambhūbhi. Sayambhussa, sayambhuno, sayambhūnaṁ. Sayambhusmiṁ, sayambhumhi,
anya-e0803n7:224_3: sayambhūsu. Bho sayambhu, bho sayambhū, bhavanto sayambhū, sayambhuvo. Evaṁ pabhū
anya-e0803n7:225_0: Sabbaññū, sabbaññū, sabbaññuno. Sabbaññuṁ, sabbaññū, sabbaññuno. Bho sabbaññu, bhavanto
anya-e0803n7:225_1: sabbaññū, sabbaññuno, sesāsu vibhattīsu padāni bhikkhusadisāni bhavanti, evaṁ vidū
anya-e0803n7:225_2: viññū kataññū maggaññū dhammaññū atthaññū kālaññū rattaññū mattaññū vadaññū avadaññū iccādīni.
anya-e0803n7:226_0: Tatra “ye ca laddhā manussattaṁ, vadaññū vītamaccharā”ti ettha “vadaññū”ti paccattabahuvacanassa
anya-e0803n7:226_1: dassanato sayambhū sabbaññū iccādīnampi paccattopayogabahuvacanattaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:226_3: “vidunī, vidunī, viduniyo. Viduniṁ, vidunī, viduniyo. Viduniyā”ti itthinayena padamālā
anya-e0803n7:226_4: kātabbā. Tathā “viññū paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitaṁ duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṁ ājānitu”nti
anya-e0803n7:226_5: ettha “viññū”ti itthiliṅgadassanato “kodhanā akataññū ca, pisuṇā mittabhedikā”ti
anya-e0803n7:226_6: ettha ca “akataññū”ti itthiliṅgadassanatopi “viññū, viññū, viññuyo. Viññuṁ, viññū,
anya-e0803n7:226_7: viññuyo. Viññuyā”ti ca “kataññū, kataññū, kataññuyo. Kataññuṁ, kataññū, kataññuyo,
anya-e0803n7:226_8: kataññuyāti ca jambūnayena padamālā kātabbā. Evaṁ “maggaññū, dhammaññū”iccādīsupi.
anya-e0803n7:226_9: “Sayambhū”ti pade pana “sayambhu ñāṇaṁ gotrabhu citta”nti dassanato napuṁsakaliṅgatte
anya-e0803n7:226_10: vattabbe “sayambhu, sayambhū, sayambhūni. Sayambhuṁ, sayambhū, sayambhūnī”ti napuṁsake
anya-e0803n7:226_11: āyunayopi gahetabbo. Esa nayo sesesupi yathārahaṁ gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n7:231_0: Yasmā panāyaṁ samattopi pāvacanādīsu yaṁ yaṁ ṭhānaṁ sotūnaṁ sammuyhanaṭṭhānaṁ dissati,
anya-e0803n7:231_1: tattha tattha sotūnamanuggahāya codanāsodhanāvasena saṁsayaṁ samugghāṭetvā puna vattabbo
anya-e0803n7:232_0: Yaṁ kira bho pāḷiyaṁ “saññate brahmacārayo, apace brahmacārayo”ti ca rūpaṁ ikārantassa
anya-e0803n7:232_1: aggisaddassa “aggayo”ti rūpamiva vuttaṁ, taṁ tathā avatvā īkārantassa daṇḍīsaddassa
anya-e0803n7:232_3: brahmacāri yathā munātīti munī”ti evaṁ ikārantavasena icchitattā. “Munayo aggayo”ti
anya-e0803n7:232_4: rūpāni viya “brahmacārayo”ti rūpaṁ bhavati. Aññattha pana “brahmaṁ caraṇasīloti brahmacārī,
anya-e0803n7:232_5: yathā dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ karaṇasīloti dukkaṭakammakārī”ti evaṁ tassīlatthaṁ gahetvā
anya-e0803n7:232_6: īkārantavasena gahaṇe “dukkaṭakammakārino”ti rūpamiva “daṇḍo assa atthīti daṇḍī”ti
anya-e0803n7:232_7: īkārantassa saddassa “daṇḍino”ti rūpamiva ca “brahmacārino”ti rūpaṁ bhavati. Tathā
anya-e0803n7:232_8: hi “ime hi nāma dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā
anya-e0803n7:232_9: paṭijānissantī”ti pāḷi dissati. Evaṁ ikārantavasena “brahmacārayo”ti paccattopayogālapanabahuvacanarūpaṁ
anya-e0803n7:232_12: brahmacārī, brahmacārino”ti daṇḍīnayena ca padamālā gahetabbā.
anya-e0803n7:233_0: Yaṁ pana āyasmā buddhaghoso “yathā sobhanti yatino, sīlabhūsanabhūsitā”ti ettha yatisaddassa
anya-e0803n7:233_1: ikārantassa aggisaddassa “aggayo”ti rūpaṁ viya “yatayo”ti rūpaṁ avatvā kasmā īkārantassa
anya-e0803n7:233_2: daṇḍīsaddassa “daṇḍino”ti rūpaṁ viya “yatino”ti rūpaṁ dasseti. Nanvesā pamādalekhā
anya-e0803n7:233_3: viya dissati. Yathā hi “kukkuṭā maṇayo daṇḍā sivayo deva te kuddhā”ti pāḷigatiyā
anya-e0803n7:233_4: upaparikkhiyamānāya “yatayo”ti rūpeneva bhavitabbaṁ ikārantattāti? Nāyaṁ pamādalekhā.
anya-e0803n7:233_5: “Vadanasīlo vādī”ti ettha viya tassīlatthaṁ gahetvā īkārantavasena yojane niddosattā,
anya-e0803n7:233_6: tasmā “yatanasīlo yatī”ti evaṁ tassīlatthaṁ cetasi sannidhāya īkārantavasena “yatino”ti
anya-e0803n7:234_0: Yattha pana tassīlatthaṁ aggahetvā “yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī”ti ettha
anya-e0803n7:234_1: viya “yatati vīriyaṁ karotīti yatī”ti kattukārakavasena ikārantabhāvo gayhati. Tattha
anya-e0803n7:234_2: “munayo maṇayo sivayo”ti yokārantarūpāni viya “yatayo”ti yokārantaṁ paccattabahuvacanarūpañca
anya-e0803n7:234_3: upayogālapanabahuvacanarūpañca bhavati, evaṁ īkārantapulliṅgānaṁ tīsu ṭhānesu yokārantāneva
anya-e0803n7:235_1: saddādī kathanti? Etesaṁ pana ikārantavasena niddiṭṭhānampi samāsapadattā agginaye
anya-e0803n7:235_2: aṭṭhatvā yathāsambhavaṁ daṇḍīnaye tiṭṭhanato nokārantāneva rūpāni. Tathā hi “asāre
anya-e0803n7:235_4: tādisameva daṭṭhabbaṁ. Nanu ca bho kaccāyanappakaraṇe “atthe visāradamatayo”ti ettha
anya-e0803n7:235_6: sāramatisaddādīnampi “visāradamatayo”ti rūpena viya yokārantehi rūpehi bhavitabbanti?
anya-e0803n7:236_0: Nanu ca bho buddhavacane “pañcime gahapatayo ānisaṁsā. Te honti jānipatayo, aññamaññaṁ
anya-e0803n7:236_2: rūpāni dissanti. Evaṁ sante kasmā “buddhavacane samāsapadānaṁ ikārantapulliṅgānaṁ
anya-e0803n7:236_3: “visāradamatayo”ti rūpasadisassa yokārantassa rūpassa adassanato”ti vuttanti? Ettha
anya-e0803n7:236_4: vuccate – visadisattaṁ paṭicca. Gahapatisaddādīsu hi yasmā patisaddo sabhāveneva
anya-e0803n7:236_5: pulliṅgo, na tu samāsato pubbe itthiliṅgapakatiko hutvā pacchā pulliṅgabhāvaṁ patto,
anya-e0803n7:236_6: tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu “gahapatayo, jānipatayo”ti yokārantāni, “senāpatayo, senāpatino”ti
anya-e0803n7:236_7: yo nokārantāni ca paccattopayogālapanabahuvacanarūpāni bhavanti. Tathā hi “tattakā
anya-e0803n7:236_8: senāpatino”ti aṭṭhakathāpāṭho dissati. Yasmā pana sāramati suddhadiṭṭhisammādiṭṭhi
anya-e0803n7:236_9: micchādiṭṭhi vajirabuddhi saddādīsu matidiṭṭhisaddādayo samāsato pubbe itthiliṅgapakatikā
anya-e0803n7:236_10: hutvā pacchā bahubbīhisamāsavasena pulliṅgabhāvappattā, tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu “sāramatino
anya-e0803n7:237_0: Seṭṭhi sārathicakkavattisāmiiccetesu kathanti? Ettha pana ayaṁ viseso veditabbo –
anya-e0803n7:237_1: katthaci pāṭhe “seṭṭhī sārathī cakkavattī sāmī”ti antakkharassa dīghattaṁ dissati,
anya-e0803n7:237_2: katthaci pana “seṭṭhi sārathi cakkavatti sāmi”iti antakkharassa rassattaṁ dissati.
anya-e0803n7:237_3: Kiñcāpi rassattametesaṁ dissati, tathāpi tattha tattha paccattavacanādibhāvena “seṭṭhino
anya-e0803n7:237_4: sārathino”tiādipayogadassanato rassaṁ katvā etāni uccāriyantīti ñāyati, tasmā evaṁ
anya-e0803n7:237_5: nibbacanattho gahetabbo – seṭṭhaṁ dhanasāraṁ, ṭhānantaraṁ vā assa atthīti seṭṭhī.
anya-e0803n7:237_6: Assadammādayo sāraṇasīloti sārathī. Cakkaṁ pavattanasīloti cakkavattī. Saṁ etassa
anya-e0803n7:237_7: atthīti sāmīti. Assatthikatassīlatthasaddā hi nokārantarūpavasena samānagatikā bhavanti
anya-e0803n7:237_8: yathā “daṇḍino bhūmisāyino”ti. Aparopi nibbacanattho īkārantavasena assadammādayo
anya-e0803n7:237_9: sāretīti sārathī. Tathā hi “purisadamme sāretīti purisadammasārathī”ti vuttaṁ. Cakkaṁ
anya-e0803n7:237_10: vattetīti cakkavattī. Evaṁ kattukārakavasena īkārantattaṁ gahetvā katthaci labbhamānampi
anya-e0803n7:237_12: gahetvā daṇḍīnayena yojetabbāni “daṇḍinī”tiādikaṁ vajjitabbaṁ vajjetvā. Evaṁ “seṭṭhino
anya-e0803n7:237_13: sārathino cakkavattino sāmino”tiādīni nokārantāniyeva rūpāni ñeyyāni.
anya-e0803n7:238_0: Atra kiñci payogaṁ nidassanamattaṁ kathayāma. “Tāta tayo seṭṭhino amhākaṁ bahūpakārā”ti
anya-e0803n7:238_1: ca “te katabhattakiccā ‘mahāseṭṭhino mayaṁ gamissāmā’ti vadiṁsū”ti ca “sārathino
anya-e0803n7:238_2: āhaṁsū”ti ca “dve cakkavattino”ti ca evamādīni. Tattha kiñcāpi katthaci “seṭṭhi sārathi”iccādi
anya-e0803n7:238_3: rassattapāṭho dissati, tathāpi so sabhāvena rassattabhāvo pāṭho na hoti, dīghassa
anya-e0803n7:238_4: rassattakaraṇapāṭhoti veditabbo. Padamālā cassa vuttanayena veditabbā.
anya-e0803n7:239_0: Mahesīti ettha kathanti? “Mahesī”ti ettha kiñcāpi mahesīsaddo īkārantavasena niddisiyati,
anya-e0803n7:239_1: tathāpi isisaddena samānagatikattā isisaddassa aggisaddena samānapadamālattā agginayena
anya-e0803n7:239_2: padamālā kātabbā. Nanu ca bho ettha tassīlattho dissati “mahante sīlakkhandhādayo
anya-e0803n7:239_3: dhamme esanasīloti mahesī”ti, tasmā “bhūmisāyī”ti padassa viya daṇḍīnayeneva padamālā
anya-e0803n7:239_4: kātabbāti? Na kātabbā tassīlatthassa asambhavato. Imassa hi “mahante sīlakkhandhādayo
anya-e0803n7:239_5: dhamme esi gavesi esitvā ṭhitoti mahesī”ti atassīlattho eva yujjati. Katakaraṇīyesu
anya-e0803n7:239_6: buddhādīsu ariyesu pavattanāmattā. Isisaddena cāyaṁ saddo īsakaṁ samāno kevalaṁ samāsapariyosāne
anya-e0803n7:239_7: dīghavasena uccāriyati, rassavasena pana “mahā isi mahesī”ti sandhiviggaho. Yasmā
anya-e0803n7:239_8: rassattaṁ gahetvā tassa padamālākaraṇaṁ yujjati, tasmā “saṅgāyiṁsu mahesayo”ti ikārantarūpaṁ
anya-e0803n7:239_9: dissati. Na hi sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane katthacipi catutthīchaṭṭhekavacanarūpaṁ
anya-e0803n7:239_11: uccāritassapi sato rassavasena uccāritassa viya “mahesi, mahesī, mahesayo. Mahesiṁ,
anya-e0803n7:239_12: mahesī, mahesayo. Mahesinā”ti padamālā kātabbā. Apica mahesīsaddo yattha rājaggubbarivācako,
anya-e0803n7:239_13: tattha itthiliṅgo hoti, tabbasena pana “mahesī, mahesī, mahesiyo. Mahesiṁ, mahesī,
anya-e0803n7:239_14: mahesiyo. Mahesiyā”ti ca vakkhamānaitthīnayena padamālā kātabbā. Hatthīsadde kathanti?
anya-e0803n7:239_15: Hatthīsaddassa pana hattho assa atthīti evaṁ īkārantavasena gahaṇe “hatthino”ti rūpaṁ
anya-e0803n7:239_16: bhavati. Tathā hi “vane hatthino”ti payogo dissati. Tasseva tasmiṁyevatthe rassaṁ
anya-e0803n7:239_17: katvā gahaṇe “hatthayo”ti rūpaṁ bhavati. Tathā hi –
anya-e0803n7:240: “Haṁsā koñcā mayūrā ca, hatthayo pasadā migā;
anya-e0803n7:241: Sabbe sīhassa bhāyanti, natthi kāyasmi tulyatā.
anya-e0803n7:243: Sopi tattha mahā hoti, neva bālo sarīravā”ti
anya-e0803n7:244_0: Imasmiṁ keḷisīlajātake “hatthayo”ti āhaccapadaṁ dissati. Evamassa daṇḍīnayena ca
anya-e0803n7:244_1: agginayena ca dvidhā padamālā, veditabbā. Iminā nayena avuttesupi ṭhānesu pāḷinayānurūpena
anya-e0803n7:245: Ettāvatā bhūdhātumayānaṁ pulliṅgānaṁ nāmikapadamālā saddhiṁ liṅgantarehi saddantarehi atthantarehi ca nānappakārato dassitā.
anya-e0803n7:248: Sadā suṭṭhu cinteti vāceti yo so,
anya-e0803n7:250: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
